Project.Name: Low_Level_User_Isr_SPI_Master
Project.Description: This example project demonstrates the basic operation of the SPI master (SCB mode)component using low level PDL function and user enabled interrupt. User enabled interrupt is used to monitor the master's status to know whether master has transmitted all data. The SPI master sends the packet with a command to the SPI slave to control the RGB LED color. The packet with a status is read back.
